alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 515 PM MST... At 445 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gold Canyon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Accumulating pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Gold Camp, and Kings Ranch. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 193 and 216. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 146 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior
